segments.source_content: Causal's cloud spreadsheet app had performance issues. They give us a detailed analysis of the problems and how they solved them via the Chrome profiler. Some issues related to AG Grid (which they patched). Others from their own code mainly related to memoization. They also tried to use Web Workers, but serialization was too expensive.

Ils prÃ©sentent une analyse dÃ©taillÃ©e des problÃ¨mes et de leur rÃ©solution via le profileur Chrome. Certains problÃ¨mes liÃ©s Ã  AG Grid (qu'ils ont corrigÃ©). segments.source_content: Presentation of the [react-native-performance](https://github.com/Shopify/react-native-performance) package which allows to generate [field / Real User Monitoring](https://web.dev/lab-and-field-data-differences/) performance reports (in JSON). It integrates easily with React-Navigation. You can send these reports to an analytics dashboard of your choice. This allows you to identify a specific screen that has performance issues in production. It reminds of existing web metrics: Core Web Vitals, TTI, INP and the Vercel/Netlify/Gatsby perf dashboards...
